original_text: Then all the officials came to Jeremiah and asked him, and he answered them as the king had instructed him. So they stopped speaking with him, for the conversation had not been overheard.
korean_text: 모든 고관이 예레미야에게 와서 물으매 그가 왕이 명령한 모든 말대로 대답하였으므로 일이 탄로되지 아니하였고 그들은 그와 더불어 말하기를 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: Then all the officials came to Jeremiah
as the king had instructed him
So they stopped speaking with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그와 더 이상 말하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: for the conversation had not been overheard
